verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

קַ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> Take אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> Aaron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּגָדִ֔ים <S%H899><s%> with him and the garments וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֑ה <S%H4888><s%> and the anointing וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> פַּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> and a bullock הַֽחַטָּ֗את <S%H2403><s%> for the sin offering וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> and two הָֽאֵילִ֔ים <S%H352><s%> rams וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> סַ֥ל <S%H5536><s%> and a basket הַמַּצּֽוֹת׃ <S%H4682><s%> of unleavened bread

וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> thou all the congregation הַקְהֵ֑ל <S%H6950><s%> together אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> unto the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַתִּקָּהֵל֙ <S%H6950><s%> was gathered together הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> him and the assembly אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> unto the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעֵדָ֑ה <S%H5712><s%> unto the congregation זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> to be done

וַיַּקְרֵ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> brought מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons וַיִּרְחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> and washed אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> them with water

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> And he put עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֻּתֹּ֗נֶת <S%H3801><s%> upon him the coat וַיַּחְגֹּ֤ר <S%H2296><s%> and girded אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> בָּֽאַבְנֵ֔ט <S%H73><s%> him with the girdle וַיַּלְבֵּ֤שׁ <S%H3847><s%> and clothed אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> אֶֽת־ <S%H854><s%> with הַמְּעִ֔יל <S%H4598><s%> him with the robe וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and put עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֵפֹ֑ד <S%H646><s%> the ephod וַיַּחְגֹּ֣ר <S%H2296><s%> upon him and he girded אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּחֵ֙שֶׁב֙ <S%H2805><s%> him with the curious girdle הָֽאֵפֹ֔ד <S%H646><s%> of the ephod וַיֶּאְפֹּ֥ד <S%H640><s%> and bound ל֖וֹ בּֽוֹ׃

וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> And he put עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> the breastplate וַיִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> upon him also he put אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הַחֹ֔שֶׁן <S%H2833><s%> in the breastplate אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאוּרִ֖ים <S%H224><s%> the Urim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתֻּמִּֽים׃ <S%H8550><s%> and the Thummim

וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> And he put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּצְנֶ֖פֶת <S%H4701><s%> the mitre עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> upon his head וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> did he put עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> and on הַמִּצְנֶ֜פֶת <S%H4701><s%> also upon the mitre אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מ֣וּל <S%H4136><s%> against פָּנָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> front אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> צִ֤יץ <S%H6731><s%> plate הַזָּהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> the golden נֵ֣זֶר <S%H5145><s%> crown הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the holy כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> took מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <S%H4888><s%> the anointing וַיִּמְשַׁ֥ח <S%H4886><s%> and anointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בּ֑וֹ וַיְקַדֵּ֖שׁ <S%H6942><s%> and all that [was] therein and sanctified אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיַּ֥ז <S%H5137><s%> And he sprinkled מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> some עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> thereof upon the altar שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <S%H6471><s%> times וַיִּמְשַׁ֨ח <S%H4886><s%> and anointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֜חַ <S%H4196><s%> the altar וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כֵּלָ֗יו <S%H3627><s%> and all his vessels וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכִּיֹּ֛ר <S%H3595><s%> both the laver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּנּ֖וֹ <S%H3653><s%> and his foot לְקַדְּשָֽׁם׃ <S%H6942><s%> to sanctify

וַיִּצֹק֙ <S%H3332><s%> And he poured מִשֶּׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <S%H4888><s%> of the anointing עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> head אַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> upon Aaron's וַיִּמְשַׁ֥ח <S%H4886><s%> and anointed אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> לְקַדְּשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6942><s%> him to sanctify

וַיַּקְרֵ֨ב <S%H7126><s%> brought מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron's וַיַּלְבִּשֵׁ֤ם <S%H3847><s%> and put כֻּתֳּנֹת֙ <S%H3801><s%> coats וַיַּחְגֹּ֤ר <S%H2296><s%> upon them and girded אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> אַבְנֵ֔ט <S%H73><s%> them with girdles וַיַּחֲבֹ֥שׁ <S%H2280><s%> and put לָהֶ֖ם מִגְבָּע֑וֹת <S%H4021><s%> bonnets כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> upon them as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וַיַּגֵּ֕שׁ <S%H5066><s%> And he brought אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> פַּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> the bullock הַֽחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> for the sin offering וַיִּסְמֹ֨ךְ <S%H5564><s%> laid אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וּבָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> and his sons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head פַּ֥ר <S%H6499><s%> of the bullock הַֽחַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> for the sin offering

וַיִּשְׁחָ֗ט <S%H7819><s%> And he slew וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> [it] and Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּם֙ <S%H1818><s%> the blood וַ֠יִּתֵּן <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on קַרְנ֨וֹת <S%H7161><s%> [it] upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֤חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> round about בְּאֶצְבָּע֔וֹ <S%H676><s%> with his finger וַיְחַטֵּ֖א <S%H2398><s%> and purified אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> the altar וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֗ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood יָצַק֙ <S%H3332><s%> and poured אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at יְס֣וֹד <S%H3247><s%> at the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar וַֽיְקַדְּשֵׁ֖הוּ <S%H6942><s%> and sanctified לְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> it to make reconciliation עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> also

וַיִּקַּ֗ח <S%H3947><s%> And he took אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַחֵלֶב֮ <S%H2459><s%> all the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> was on הַקֶּרֶב֒ <S%H7130><s%> that [was] upon the inwards וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> יֹתֶ֣רֶת <S%H3508><s%> and the caul הַכָּבֵ֔ד <S%H3516><s%> [above] the liver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> and the two הַכְּלָיֹ֖ת <S%H3629><s%> kidneys וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶלְבְּהֶ֑ן <S%H2459><s%> and their fat וַיַּקְטֵ֥ר <S%H6999><s%> burned מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <S%H4196><s%> [it] upon the altar

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֤ר <S%H6499><s%> But the bullock וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹרוֹ֙ <S%H5785><s%> and his hide וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂר֣וֹ <S%H1320><s%> his flesh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּרְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H6569><s%> and his dung שָׂרַ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> he burnt בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> with fire מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וַיַּקְרֵ֕ב <S%H7126><s%> And he brought אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֵ֣יל <S%H352><s%> the ram הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> for the burnt offering וַֽיִּסְמְכ֞וּ <S%H5564><s%> laid אַהֲרֹ֧ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head הָאָֽיִל׃ <S%H352><s%> of the ram

וַיִּשְׁחָ֑ט <S%H7819><s%> And he killed וַיִּזְרֹ֨ק <S%H2236><s%> sprinkled מֹשֶׁ֧ה <S%H4872><s%> [it] and Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּ֛ם <S%H1818><s%> the blood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַ֔יִל <S%H352><s%> the ram נִתַּ֖ח <S%H5408><s%> And he cut לִנְתָחָ֑יו <S%H5409><s%> into pieces וַיַּקְטֵ֤ר <S%H6999><s%> burnt מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> and Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the head וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּתָחִ֖ים <S%H5409><s%> and the pieces וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּֽדֶר׃ <S%H6309><s%> and the fat

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> the inwards וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכְּרָעַ֖יִם <S%H3767><s%> and the legs רָחַ֣ץ <S%H7364><s%> And he washed בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> in water וַיַּקְטֵר֩ <S%H6999><s%> burnt מֹשֶׁ֨ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָאַ֜יִל <S%H352><s%> the whole ram הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חָה <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar עֹלָ֨ה <S%H5930><s%> it [was] a burnt sacrifice ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְרֵֽיחַ־ <S%H7381><s%> savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H5207><s%> for a sweet אִשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H801><s%> [and] an offering made by fire הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses

וַיַּקְרֵב֙ <S%H7126><s%> And he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> ram הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> the other אֵ֖יל <S%H352><s%> the ram הַמִּלֻּאִ֑ים <S%H4394><s%> of consecration וַֽיִּסְמְכ֞וּ <S%H5564><s%> laid אַהֲרֹ֧ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> their hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head הָאָֽיִל׃ <S%H352><s%> of the ram
